query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Report of the use case: Slovakia-Austria
result.description: This deliverable describes the outcomes achieved when exercising the VALKYRIES solutions in a real demonstration between Slovakia and Austria, as well as outlining the impact of the demonstration outcomes and end-user acceptance. At M24, both Report (R) and Demonstrator (DEM) will be delivered.
